    • addNewStop

      public void addNewStop(int stopID, LocalDateTime arrive, LocalDateTime dept)
      Description copied from interface: ITrip
      Add a new stop into the HashMap stops of a trip object Check if the stopId already exists in stops before call this method
      Specified by:
      addNewStop in interface ITrip
      Parameters:
      stopID - - ID of the station will be added
      arrive - - LocalDateTimeObject stands for when this trip arrives this stop
      dept - - LocalDateTime Object stands for when this trip departures from this trip

    • directToDestination

      public boolean directToDestination(LocalDateTime currentTime, int source, int destination)
      Description copied from interface: ITrip
      Helper method to make a judgment if there this trip can reach the destination directly
      Specified by:
      directToDestination in interface ITrip
      Parameters:
      currentTime - - a LocalDateTime stands for the current Time
      source - - departure station's ID
      destination - - destination station's ID
      Returns:
      boolean value, true if directly accessible by this trip, otherwise return false
